src:
Main Rabu, Ini Jadwal dan Skuad Timnas U-19 di Kualifikasi AFC
04 Nov 2019, 22:57 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Tim Nasional Indonesia U-19 atau Timnas U-19 akan mulai berjuang di babak kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 yang akan berlangsung di Stadion Madya dan Stadion Gelora Bung Karno pada 6-10 November 2019.
Indonesia berlaga di K, bersama Timor Leste, Hong Kong, dan Korea Utara. Nantinya juara grup dan 4 runner-up terbaik (dari 11 grup) akan lolos ke putaran final yang akan digelar di Uzbekistan.
Timans U-19 sudah mempersiapkan diri dengan baik untuk ajang ini. Mereka melakukan rangkaian pemusatan latihan dan seleksi pemain di Bogor, mereka juga telah menjalani uji coba lokal dan dua uji coba internasional melawan Timnas Cina U-19.
Hasil uji coba lokal, Timnas U-19 mengalahkan tim Pra PON DKI 3-0 dan bermain imbang tanpa gol saat melawan Tira Persikabo. Sedangkan, saat melawan Cina U-19 di Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya, menang 3-1 dan ketika bermain di Stadion Kapten I Wayan Dipta, Bali, kalah 1-3.
Memasuki persiapan akhir, tim ini terus fokus membenahi transisi positif dan negatif antarlini di lapangan. "Kami pada setiap latihan dan menuju akhir pemusatan latihan, masih fokus mempertajam transisi positif dan negatif. Artinya peralihan dari situasi bertahan ke menyerang, begitu juga sebaliknya," kata Fakhri seperti dikutip dari situs resmi PSSI, Senin, 4 November 2019.
Fakhri juga melakukan perubahan pemain di beberapa posisi di lapangan. Hal ini dilakukan agar membuat pemain bisa bermain lebih dari satu posisi di lapang. "Ini penting bagi kami, untuk dilakukan, karena saya ingin coba merotasi beberapa pemain, supaya mereka bisa merasakan bermain di satu posisi saja," ujarnya.
Berikut jadwal Timnas U-19 di kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020:
6 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Stadion Madya)Indonesia vs Timor Leste
8 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Stadion Madya)Hong Kong vs Indonesia
10 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Stadion Gelora Bung Karno)Indonesia vs Korea Utara.
Daftar pemain Timnas U-19 kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020:
Kiper:1. Ernando Ari Sutaryadi – Persebaya Surabaya2. Muhammad Risky Sudirman – Persija Jakarta3. Muhammad Adisatryo – PPLP Jakarta
Belakang:4. Komang Teguh Trisnanda – Diklat Ragunan5. Muhammad Salman Alfarid – Diklat Ragunan6. Bayu Mohamad Fiqri – ASIFA7. Amiruddin Bagas Kaffa Arrizqi – Barito Putera8. Mochammad Yudha Febrian – Barito Putera9. Rizky Ridho Ramadhani – Persebaya Surabaya10. Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah – PPLP Jakarta11. Alfeandra Dewangga – PPLP Jawa Tengah
Tengah:12. Brylian Negiehta Dwiki Aldama – Persebaya Surabaya13. Theo Fillo Da Costa Numberi – Persipura Jayapura14. David Maulana – Barito Putera15. Beckham Putra Nugraha – Persib Bandung16. Rendy Juliansyah17. Braif Fatari – Persija Jakarta
Depan:18. Khairul Imam Zakiri – Leganes Academy19. Mochammad Supriadi – Persebaya Surabaya20. Muhammad Fajar Fathur Rahman – ASAD 31321. Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi Alfikri – Barito Putera22. Sutan Diego Armandoondriano Zico – Persija Jakarta23. Serdy Hepyfano – PPLP Maluku Utara.
text:
Play Wednesday, This is the U-19 national team schedule and squad in the AFC Qualification
Nov. 04 2019, 22:57 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian U-19 National Team or U-19 National Team will start fighting in the AFC U-19 2020 qualification round which will take place at Madya Stadium and Gelora Bung Karno Stadium on November 6-10, 2019.
Indonesia competed in K, along with Timor Leste, Hong Kong and North Korea. Later the group winners and the 4 best runners-up (out of 11 groups) will qualify for the finals which will be held in Uzbekistan.
U-19 Timans have prepared themselves well for this event. They conducted a series of training camps and selection of players in Bogor, they have also undergone local trials and two international trials against the China U-19 national team.
Local trial results, the U-19 national team defeated the Pre-PON DKI team 3-0 and played a goalless draw against Tira Persikabo. Meanwhile, against China U-19 at Gelora Bung Tomo, Surabaya, won 3-1 and when playing at the Captain I Wayan Dipta Stadium, Bali, lost 1-3.
Entering the final preparations, the team continues to focus on fixing the positive and negative transitions between lines on the field. "We are at every exercise and towards the end of the training camp, we are still focused on sharpening the positive and negative transitions. This means that the transition from a defensive to attacking situation, and vice versa," Fakhri was quoted as saying on the PSSI official website, Monday, November 4, 2019.
Fakhri also changes players in several positions on the field. This is done so that players can play in more than one position in the field. "This is important for us, to do, because I want to try rotating several players, so they can feel playing in one position," he said.
Following is the schedule for the U-19 national team in the AFC U-19 2020 qualifiers:
6 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Madya Stadium) Indonesia vs Timor Leste
8 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Madya Stadium) Hong Kong vs. Indonesia
10 November 2019, 19.00 WIB (Gelora Bung Karno Stadium) Indonesia vs North Korea.
List of U-19 national team qualifiers for AFC U-19 2020:
Goalkeeper: 1. Ernando Ari Sutaryadi - Persebaya Surabaya2. Muhammad Risky Sudirman - Persija Jakarta3. Muhammad Adisatryo - PPLP Jakarta
Back: 4. Komang Teguh Trisnanda - Ragunan Education and Training5. Muhammad Salman Alfarid - Ragunan Education and Training6. Bayu Mohamad Fiqri - ASIFA7. Amiruddin Bagas Kaffa Arrizqi - Barito Putera8. Mochammad Yudha Febrian - Barito Putera9. Rizky Ridho Ramadhani - Persebaya Surabaya10. Muhammad Fadhil Adhitya Akshah - PPLP Jakarta11. Alfeandra Dewangga - PPLP Central Java
Middle: 12. Brylian Negiehta Dwiki Aldama - Persebaya Surabaya13. Theo Fillo Da Costa Numberi - Persipura Jayapura14. David Maulana - Barito Putera15. Beckham Putra Nugraha - Persib Bandung16. Rendy Juliansyah17. Braif Fatari - Persija Jakarta
Front: 18. Khairul Imam Zakiri - Leganes Academy19. Mochammad Supriadi - Persebaya Surabaya20. Muhammad Fajar Fathur Rahman - ASAD 31321. Amiruddin Bagus Kahfi Alfikri - Barito Putera22. Sutan Diego Armandoondriano Zico - Persija Jakarta23. Serdy Hepyfano - PPLP North Maluku.
